title: Sereir Tariq
text:
I’m an intern at Capital Fund Management in Paris, diving into the complexities of American options pricing with the volatility team. My work involves exploring advanced pricing methods and developing solutions using Python, C++, and Rust.
Currently, I’m pursuing a Master’s in Financial Engineering at ENSIMAG in Grenoble, where I delve into quantitative finance, stochastic calculus, and derivatives.
Outside of work, I enjoy exploring new technologies and problem-solving. I’m also passionate about sharing knowledge and contributing to the finance and tech communities.
Interests: Quantitative Finance, Algorithm Development, Financial Technology, Continuous Learning



If you have questions about my work or are interested in collaborating, feel free to contact me. I am always interested in discussing workshop offerings and collaborative opportunities.
